meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant in the honeysuckle family.
meanings.sent1: The loniceras in the garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: I planted several loniceras along the fence for a colorful display.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn stash among the loniceras.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and fragrant as a loniceras in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of loniceras filled the air, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'lonicera', referring to multiple plants of this type.
meanings.sent1: We admired the vibrant colors of the loniceras in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: The loniceras in our backyard attract many butterflies and bees.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to play hide-and-seek among the loniceras.
meanings.sent4: The field of loniceras swayed gently in the breeze, a sea of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the buzzing of bees around the loniceras.
